Sentencas: Layered Ruddlesden-Popper (RP) lanthanide nickelates, Ln(n+1)Ni(n)O(3n+1) (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n = 1, 2 and 3), are considered potential cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: In this study, the thermal evolution of the structure, oxygen nonstoichiometry, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of La2NiO4+delta, Nd2NiO4+delta, La3Ni2O7-delta, La4Ni3O10-delta, Pr4Ni3O10-delta and Nd4Ni3O10-delta are investigated.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: Phase transitions involving a disruption of the cooperative tilting of the perovskite layers in the low-temperature structure thereby transforming it to a more symmetric structure are observed in several of the materials upon heating in air.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: Pr4Ni3O10-delta and Nd4Ni3O10-delta show no phase transition from room temperature up to 1000 degrees C. High density ceramics (>96%) are obtained after sintering at 1300 degrees C and (for n = 2 and n = 3 members) post-sintering annealing at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: Data for the electrical conductivity measurements on these specimens indicate itinerant behaviour of the charge carriers in the RP nickelates.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: The increase in p-type conductivity with the order n of the RP phase is interpreted as arising from the concomitant increase in the formal valence of Ni.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: The observations can be interpreted in terms of a simple energy band scheme, showing that electron holes are formed in the sigma x(2)-y(2)up arrow band upon increasing the oxidation state of Ni.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity relaxation measurements reveal remarkable similarities between the surface exchange coefficients (k(chem)) of the different RP phases despite the differences in the order parameter n and the nature of the lanthanide ion.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: Calculation of the oxygen self-diffusion coefficients (D-s) from the experimental values of the chemical diffusion coefficients (D-chem), using the corresponding data of oxygen non-stoichiometry from thermogravimetry measurements, shows that these are strongly determined by the order parameter n.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: The value of D-s decreases almost one order of magnitude on going from the n = 1 members La2NiO4+delta and Nd2NiO4+delta to the n = 2 member La3Ni2O7-delta, and again one order of magnitude on going to the n = 3 members La4Ni3O10-delta, Pr4Ni3O10-delta and Nd4Ni3O10-delta.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)

Sentencas: The results confirm that oxygen-ion transport in the investigated RP nickelates predominantly occurs via an interstitialcy mechanism within the rock-salt layer of the structures.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and oxygen transport properties of Ruddlesden-Popper phases Lnn+1NinO3n+1 (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; n=1, 2 and 3)
